name: Small Business Finance Center (IBank)
description: Disaster Relief Loan Guarantee, Jump Start Loan Program, and other financing programs for small businesses focusing on job creation in low- to moderate-income communities
fullDescription: California's IBank Small Business Finance Center offers loan guarantee programs to help small businesses access capital for growth and recovery.
whatTheyOffer:
- Disaster Relief Loan Guarantee Program
- Jump Start Loan Program (up to $10,000 for microenterprises)
- Small Business Loan Guarantee Program
- Focus on job creation in underserved communities
- Help accessing capital when traditional loans aren't available
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the IBank website to learn about programs
2. Determine which program fits your needs
3. Work with a participating lender (IBank provides the guarantee)
4. Submit loan application through the lender
5. IBank guarantee helps you get approved
keywords: IBank, Small Business Finance Center, loan guarantee, Jump Start Loan, disaster relief, small business loan, microenterprise, California, capital access
